post.body: Hi Kevin. Been following Diggnation for quite a while now. Thanks for the show, btw. Have you have tried Norwegian beer? :)
Yeah. Good to see the ball in the net, after the 5/6 'almosts' in the game. :)
Why?
Hope you had a great Christmas, looking forward to see you again over newyears. Cheers, buddy
Hehe..: Blink is about the first two seconds of looking--the decisive glance that knows in an instant. http://bit.ly/2mTUQh
Yes. I enjoyed it. Fascinating anecdotes, and the 'idea' of the book is good.
'Blink' by Macolm Gladwell
'Blink' by Macolm Gladwell
I started reading 'Blink' this morning, and just finished it. :)
I totally agree! :) Good for you!
thanks a lot. I'll take a look at "Tipping Point" after "Blink". :)
Playing guitarhero with my kids (11 and 13) damn I feel old... hehe... they are soo much better than me!
First time in years I have the time to spend the whole holiday with the family. No work until the 5th jan. Awsome!
Next book for tomorrow is 'Reality Check'http://bit.ly/m4dF - by @guykawasaki
finished the book. A good read - interesting perspective - and I agree with the idea of the book. :)
Reading "blink" by Malcolm Gladwell. Anyone read it? Thoughts on the book?
MERRY CHRISTMAS ♫ ♫ ♫ ♫ ♫ ♫ ♫ ♫ ♫ ♫ ♫
